Description_lang: Virulent Plague's duration is increased by ${$s2/1000} sec and its damage is increased by |cFFFFFFFF${$s1}.1%|r.

description_blz.en_US: Virulent Plague's duration is increased by 3 sec and its damage is increased by 10.0%.
description_blz.es_MX: La duración de Peste virulenta aumenta 3 s y su daño aumenta un 10.0%.
description_blz.pt_BR: A duração da Peste Virulenta é aumentada em 3 s e o dano é aumentado em 10,0%.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht die Dauer von 'Virulente Seuche' um 3 Sek. und den Schaden um 10,0%.
description_blz.en_GB: Virulent Plague's duration is increased by 3 sec and its damage is increased by 10.0%.
description_blz.es_ES: La duración de Peste virulenta aumenta 3 s y su daño aumenta un 10,0%.
description_blz.fr_FR: La durée de Peste virulente est augmentée de 3 s et ses dégâts sont augmentés de 10,0%.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la durata di Piaga Virulenta di 3 s e i danni che infligge del 10,0%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Продлевает действие "Смертоносной чумы" на 3 сек. и увеличивает ее урон на 10,0%.
description_blz.zh_TW: 惡性瘟疫的持續時間延長3秒，造成的傷害提高10.0%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 恶性病变的持续时间延长3秒，造成的伤害提高10.0%。
